data.text:
@gsef07 I’m sorry for the confusion, but I can certainly help with this.

Until the transaction closes, it is business as usual for Spirit. We expect to conclude the regulatory process and close the transaction no later than the first half of 2024.

data.text: Happy #GivingTuesday! We believe in giving back every day - that’s why the Spirit Charitable Foundation has pledged $1 million to a total of 44 non-profit organizations for 2022. Learn more about our work: https://t.co/iL93Xplv7w https://t.co/zilWHd54Fm

urls.title: Spirit Foundation - Home · Spirit Airlines Support
urls.description: The Spirit Charitable Foundation believes change starts by giving back. We are committed to inspiring positive change in the communities where we live and work. We invest in organizations that have a meaningful social impact on the lives of Children and Families, Service Members and the Environment, through Team Member volunteerism, monetary, and in-kind donations. Thanks to the incredible generosity of our donors, the 2022 Spirit Open and our Evening Off The Runway events raised over $1.5 million
